system.description: Through study and practice, the character can quickly learn to operate unfamiliar weapons.
system.benefit: When wielding a weapon for which the character lacks the Ranged Weapon Training, Melee Weapon Training, or Exotic Weapon Training Talent for. The character can make a +0 Tech-use Test as a Half Action. If successful, they can operate the weapon without penalty as if they had the talent for one round, +1 round per Degree of success on test.

rollConfig.description: Tech-Use test to operate unfamiliar weapons

specialAbilities.name: Weapon Improvisation
specialAbilities.description: Half Action. Make Tech-Use test to operate an unfamiliar weapon without penalty for 1 round, +1 per DoS.
